meanings.definition: In a reluctant or unwilling manner.
meanings.sent1: She completed her chores grudgingly, dragging her feet the whole time.
meanings.sent2: He grudgingly agreed to help his friend move, even though he had other plans.
meanings.sent3: The cat grudgingly allowed the dog to share its favorite spot on the couch.
meanings.sent4: The old car grudgingly sputtered to life after sitting in the garage for months.
meanings.sent5: The student grudgingly admitted that the teacher was right all along.

meanings.sent1: With a grudgingly expression, she finally agreed to go to the party.
meanings.sent2: The grudgingly student refused to participate in the group project.
meanings.sent3: The grudgingly toddler crossed his arms and pouted when asked to share his toys.
meanings.sent4: The grudgingly cat glared at the new kitten invading its territory.
meanings.sent5: The grudgingly employee completed the task with a scowl on his face.
